roleset.name: obstruct a passage

roles.note: It is VERY important to distinguish the agent and the congesting substance!

example.name: Overcrowding
example.text: [The campus sidewalks]-1 were congested *-1 with people.

example.name: Cold Agent, all Args
example.text: The cold congested my sinuses with mucus.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'congest' based on ectb2; adjectival 'congested' based on BOLT-7. Comparison with 'clog.' No VerbNet entry.

example.name: adjectival rel: congested
example.text: Roads are congested and people are angry !
